com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util

Class MediaUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util.MediaUtil

  • public class MediaUtil
extends Object
    Utilities for loading media.
    Author:
    lizlooney@google.com (Liz Looney)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static File copyMediaToTempFile(Form form, String mediaPath)
      Copies the media specified by mediaPath to a temp file and returns the File.
      static BitmapDrawable getBitmapDrawable(Form form, String mediaPath)
      Loads the image specified by mediaPath and returns a Drawable.
      static void loadMediaPlayer(MediaPlayer mediaPlayer, Form form, String mediaPath)
      Loads the audio or video specified by mediaPath into the given MediaPlayer.
      static int loadSoundPool(SoundPool soundPool, Form form, String mediaPath)
      Loads the audio specified by mediaPath into the given SoundPool and returns the sound id.
      static void loadVideoView(VideoView videoView, Form form, String mediaPath)
      Loads the video specified by mediaPath into the given VideoView.
      static InputStream openMedia(Form form, String mediaPath)

                    String mediaPath)
                             throws IOException
        Throws:

      • copyMediaToTempFile

        public static File copyMediaToTempFile(Form form,
                       String mediaPath)
                                throws IOException
        Copies the media specified by mediaPath to a temp file and returns the File.
        Parameters:
        form - the Form
        mediaPath - the path to the media
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getBitmapDrawable

        public static BitmapDrawable getBitmapDrawable(Form form,
                               String mediaPath)
                                        throws IOException
        Loads the image specified by mediaPath and returns a Drawable.

        If mediaPath is null or empty, null is returned.

        Parameters:
        form - the Form
        mediaPath - the path to the media
        Returns:
        a Drawable or null
        Throws:
        IOException

      • loadSoundPool

        public static int loadSoundPool(SoundPool soundPool,
                Form form,
                String mediaPath)
                         throws IOException
        Loads the audio specified by mediaPath into the given SoundPool and returns the sound id. Note that if the mediaPath is a content URI or an URL, the audio must be copied to a temp file and then loaded from there. This could have performance implications.
        Parameters:
        soundPool - the SoundPool
        form - the Form
        mediaPath - the path to the media
        Throws:
        IOException

      • loadMediaPlayer

        public static void loadMediaPlayer(MediaPlayer mediaPlayer,
                   Form form,
                   String mediaPath)
                            throws IOException
        Loads the audio or video specified by mediaPath into the given MediaPlayer.
        Parameters:
        mediaPlayer - the MediaPlayer
        form - the Form
        mediaPath - the path to the media
        Throws:
        IOException

      • loadVideoView

        public static void loadVideoView(VideoView videoView,
                 Form form,
                 String mediaPath)
                          throws IOException
        Loads the video specified by mediaPath into the given VideoView. Note that if the mediaPath is an asset or an URL, the video must be copied to a temp file and then loaded from there. This could have performance implications.
        Parameters:
        videoView - the VideoView
        form - the Form
        mediaPath - the path to the media
        Throws:
        IOException
